20110106171325.000|20110106171328.000|TR0|when they first got started reading the 
20110106171328.000|20110106171331.000|TR0|Constitution, there was a bit of -- I 
20110106171331.000|20110106171334.000|TR0|guess you could say almost a challenge.  
20110106171334.000|20110106171337.000|TR0|There were a few Democrats who came up and

20110106172341.000|20110106172344.000|TR0|
20110106172344.000|20110106172347.000|TR0|POPPY HARLOW, CNNMONEY.COM:  Fred, what we

20110106172356.000|20110106172358.000|TR0|presidential commission looking into that 
20110106172358.000|20110106172401.000|TR0|BP oil spill.
20110106172401.000|20110106172404.000|TR0|
20110106172404.000|20110106172407.000|TR0|And I want to get to some of the key 
20110106172407.000|20110106172410.000|TR0|findings here.
20110106172410.000|20110106172413.000|TR0|
20110106172413.000|20110106172416.000|TR0|First of all, what this said is that the 
20110106172416.000|20110106172419.000|TR0|problems with deepwater drilling are 
20110106172419.000|20110106172422.000|TR0|systemic.  They said it's not one 
20110106172422.000|20110106172425.000|TR0|company's fault, it's not an aberration.
20110106172425.000|20110106172428.000|TR0|
20110106172428.000|20110106172431.000|TR0|They also said that the blowout and the 
20110106172431.000|20110106172434.000|TR0|ensuing oil spill could have been 
20110106172434.000|20110106172437.000|TR0|prevented.  They named three main 
20110106172437.000|20110106172440.000|TR0|companies here that they're clearly 
20110106172440.000|20110106172443.000|TR0|focusing on.
20110106172443.000|20110106172446.000|TR0|
20110106172446.000|20110106172449.000|TR0|The first, of course, BP, that got all the 
20110106172449.000|20110106172452.000|TR0|attention, that drilled the well.  But 
20110106172452.000|20110106172455.000|TR0|then there's two companies you may not 
20110106172455.000|20110106172458.000|TR0|know were very involved in this.
20110106172458.000|20110106172501.000|TR0|
20110106172501.000|20110106172504.000|TR0|Transocean, they owned the rig and they 
20110106172504.000|20110106172507.000|TR0|leased it to BP.  So they could have some 
20110106172507.000|20110106172509.000|TR0|liability.  Halliburton, they cemented the 
20110106172509.000|20110106172512.000|TR0|well.
20110106172512.000|20110106172515.000|TR0|
20110106172515.000|20110106172518.000|TR0|The big question that this reports brings 
20110106172518.000|20110106172521.000|TR0|up that they focused on is, did these 
20110106172521.000|20110106172524.000|TR0|companies ignore safety precautions in 
20110106172524.000|20110106172527.000|TR0|order to gain profit?  And I want to read 
20110106172527.000|20110106172530.000|TR0|you a report from this report.  It's 
20110106172530.000|20110106172533.000|TR0|rather damning.
20110106172533.000|20110106172536.000|TR0|
20110106172536.000|20110106172539.000|TR0|It says, "Whether purposeful or not, many 
20110106172539.000|20110106172542.000|TR0|of the decisions that BP, Halliburton and 
20110106172542.000|20110106172545.000|TR0|Transocean made that increased the risk of 
20110106172545.000|20110106172548.000|TR0|Macondo blowout clearly saved those 
20110106172548.000|20110106172551.000|TR0|companies significant time and money."

20110106172554.000|20110106172557.000|TR0|Now, BP, for its part, saying it has 
20110106172557.000|20110106172600.000|TR0|cooperated with the commission fully, with

20110106172612.000|20110106172615.000|TR0|full report that we'll get on Tuesday.
20110106172615.000|20110106172618.000|TR0|
20110106172618.000|20110106172620.000|TR0|WHITFIELD:  And what's the expectation of 
20110106172620.000|20110106172623.000|TR0|the impact of the commission's findings?   
20110106172623.000|20110106172626.000|TR0|    HARLOW:  That's a great question.
20110106172626.000|20110106172629.000|TR0|
20110106172629.000|20110106172632.000|TR0|Actually, this could turn out to be pretty 
20110106172632.000|20110106172635.000|TR0|good for BP, all things relative.  Some 
20110106172635.000|20110106172638.000|TR0|analysts are saying that in terms of the 
20110106172638.000|20110106172641.000|TR0|issue of gross negligence, how much BP can 
20110106172641.000|20110106172644.000|TR0|be fined in the end, this may take that 
20110106172644.000|20110106172647.000|TR0|off of BP, because under the Clean Water 
20110106172647.000|20110106172650.000|TR0|Act in this country, if BP can be proved
